title: Apple BootCamp6 Boot Camp 6 Support Files (Drivers)
description:
Install BootCamp6.0.6133 drivers on unsupported Macintoshes running Windows 10 Home or Pro.

1)Unzip all files to a convenient place.

2)Open a Command Line Window with administrator privileges.

3)Navigate to the BootCamp folder, specifically *BootCampDriversApple

4)Enter the Command: "msiexec /i BootCamp.msi" without the quotes.

5)Allow for drivers to install and then restart. All should work just fine.


Thank you to Yoputuber josephjamesdrew for his command line work, see the video at:





Enjoy!
